name: Retrowave '84
description:
A short throwback styled FPS prototype, with a wide range of power ups, enemies, weapons and more! Development is Currently on Hold as of now, but may resume in future! Enjoy!

Controls:

Move: WASD

Jump: Space Bar

Shoot: Left Mouse Button

Aim/Zoom: Hold Right Mouse Button

To quit the game at any time: Windows Key > Close Window

Restart Level: R

Interact: Walk over in game items to obtain/interact 

DEVELOPMENT BACKGROUND - PLEASE READ:

RETROWAVE '84 is a short throwback first person shooter prototype that I developed before I started releasing games on itch.io, therefore, it is a prototype so it may have issues during experience, development was then put on hold as a result of starting development of my upcoming horror FPS title 'The Long Road Back' Due to the uncertain future of Retrowave 84 I have opted to release a prototype on itch.io to see how it does and to get some feedback, enjoy!
